title: T210 Old Mill Charlotte cards (want list)
author: BrettHoneycutt

posts.post_title: T210 Old Mill Charlotte cards (want list)
posts.post_content:
I have 6 of the 15 Charlotte cards from the T210 Old Mill Series 5 set and need the 9 below to complete the Charlotte team set.

(I grew up in Charlotte attending minor league games and collect Charlotte minor league baseball memorabilia, especially cards).

Willing to accept any condition. 

1910 T210 Old Mill Charlotte Want List

Brazell – Charlotte
Cross – Charlotte
Coutts – Charlotte
Dobard – Charlotte
Duvie – Charlotte
Hayes – Charlotte
Humphrey – Charlotte
Johnson – Charlotte
McHugh – Charlotte

Thank you,

Brett
(brettrhoneycutt@hotmail.com)
